premise_source_doc_sentence: The rights to further films featuring the character were purchased in 1985 , and moved through various production companies and studios before being secured by Sony Pictures Entertainment  (  Columbia Pictures  )  , who hired Sam Raimi to direct Spider-Man  (  2002  )  , Spider-Man 2  (  2004  )  , and Spider-Man 3  (  2007  )  starring Tobey Maguire .
